sentences.sentence: Ole missis, she tole me I got to go an' git dis water an' not stop foolin' roun' wid anybody.
sentences.translation: 老太太，她告诉我去提水，路上不准停下来和别人玩。

sentences.sentence: Hey. You haven't seen the last of us, missis.
sentences.translation: 嗨。你还没看到我们最后的情况，太太。

sentences.sentence: Ole missis she'd take an 'tar DE head off 'n me.' Deed she would.
sentences.translation: 老太太她会把我的头给拧下来的，她真的会的！
